single_tables.crosschainzone_info: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS crosschainzone_info (no INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, zone_type INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, rpc TEXT NOT NULL, multi_addr VARCHAR(42) NOT NULL, visit_block_height BIGINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (no)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
single_tables.hub_chain_info: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS hub_chain_info (chain_id INT NOT NULL, symbol TEXT NOT NULL, name TEXT NOT NULL, source_chain_num BIGINT NOT NULL, system_contract_num BIGINT NOT NULL, visit_block_height BIGINT NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (chain_id)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
single_tables.source_chain_info: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS source_chain_info (chain_id INT NOT NULL, symbol TEXT NOT NULL, name TEXT NOT NULL, state INT NOT NULL, visit_block_height BIGINT NOT NULL, register_tx_hash VARCHAR(66), created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (chain_id)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
single_tables.system_contract_info: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS system_contract_info (contract_id INT NOT NULL, contract_addr VARCHAR(42) NOT NULL, manager_addr VARCHAR(42) NOT NULL, contract_state INT NOT NULL, chain_id INT NOT NULL, level_id INT NOT NULL, visit_block_height BIGINT NOT NULL, deploy_tx_hash VARCHAR(66), created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (contract_id), UNIQUE KEY uk_addr (contract_addr)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
single_tables.hub_block_info: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS hub_block_info (no BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, block_hash VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL, prev_hash VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL, block_height BIGINT NOT NULL, if_matter TINYINT(1) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (no), UNIQUE KEY uk_hash (block_hash)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
single_tables.hub_tx_info: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS hub_tx_info (no BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, tx_hash VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL, block_hash VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL, tx_index BIGINT NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (no), UNIQUE KEY uk_tx (tx_hash), UNIQUE KEY uk_block_tx (block_hash, tx_index)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
single_tables.event_type: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS event_type (no BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, event_sig VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL, description TEXT NOT NULL, event_param JSON NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (no), UNIQUE KEY uk_sig (event_sig)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
single_tables.event_info: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS event_info (no BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, contract_addr VARCHAR(42) NOT NULL, event_sig VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL, event_topic TEXT, event_data TEXT, tx_hash VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL, event_index BIGINT NOT NULL, if_process TINYINT(1) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (no), UNIQUE KEY uk_tx_event (tx_hash, event_index)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
single_tables.relay_basic_info: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS relay_basic_info (chain_id INT NOT NULL, genesis_key VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL, gas_bound VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL, commit_time_out VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL, require_stake VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL, processed_penalty VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL, un_processed_penalty VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (chain_id)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4

template_tables.source_shadow_info: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {table_name} (no BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT, shadow_key VARCHAR(66), prev_key VARCHAR(66), offset_height BIGINT, commit_event_no BIGINT, commit_relayer_addr VARCHAR(42), commit_value VARCHAR(66), open_event_no BIGINT, open_event_type BIGINT, open_relayer_addr VARCHAR(42), open_result TINYINT(1), raw_data TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (no), INDEX idx_shadow_key (shadow_key), INDEX idx_prev_key (prev_key)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
template_tables.transport_task_info: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {table_name} (id BIGINT NOT NULL, task_hash VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL, task_state BIGINT NOT NULL, user_addr VARCHAR(42) NOT NULL, create_event_no BIGINT NOT NULL, task_type_1 BIGINT NOT NULL, payload TEXT NOT NULL, task_type_2 BIGINT NOT NULL, accept_event_no BIGINT NOT NULL, accept_event_type BIGINT NOT NULL, accept_relayer_addr VARCHAR(42) NOT NULL, finish_event_no BIGINT NOT NULL, finish_event_type BIGINT NOT NULL, finish_role_addr VARCHAR(42) NOT NULL, source_tx_key VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL, source_tx_raw TEXT NOT NULL, source_shadow_key VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (id), UNIQUE KEY uk_task (task_hash)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4
